channel.title: Books of 2021 on Liwen's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Books of 2021 on Liwen's blog

item.title: [Review] 价值
item.description: <价值> - 高磊 张磊 我对价值的思考 Be A Friend of Time 在长期主义之路上，与伟大格局观者同行，做时间的朋友。

item.title: [Review] What I Wish I Knew When I Was 20
item.description: <What I Wish I Knew When I Was 20> - Tina Seelig The book is a gift from a creative and inspiring Stanford teacher, Tina Seeling to her son Josh’s 20th birthday.

item.title: Reading List
item.description: <What I Wish I Knew When I Was 20> - Tina Seelig <价值> - 张磊 <三十六计> - 佚名
